Comment: Elon Musk’s quiet departure to his new six-bedroom, 6,900-square-foot mansion in Texas offers insight into his mind and madness.  Having built a massive border around his Texas property to keep out prying eyes. He has two other properties in the area, and there is speculation he wants to raise his growing brood of children in the Lone Star State.  But he didn’t bother with the permits. All in all, there were six code violations. Now his neighbors are complaining, and someone has to clean up the mess. Musk will have to wait until a June 11 planning meeting to discover if he will be ordered to remove the fence and start again.  [**Read the full story here**](https://www.thedailybeast.com/elon-musk-runs-into-more-trouble-out-west-after-white-house-exit/).
Author: thedailybeast

Comment: Elon Musk and Nick Cannon are in a baby making competition.

Comment: The article got this right:  "His business empire reflects the choices of a wildly imaginative child."  Yep, I am 100% convinced Elon has arrested development.  .....and a large swath of the base as well, which makes me believe some issues in the US are MUCH more widespread than I ever dared imagine as it suggest a lot of childhood trauma.
